page.title: 09CARAVAN CAR PARK/INDUSTRY
page.content: 1969 and covering 13 acres,contains sites for 153 caravans or mobile homes.The park has a shop,public telephone,toilets,firepoints and some garages for residents.At present 288 people live there,while a further 4 are employed for the running of the site. INDUSTRY - Bilston Glen Colliery-seen for miles.Production,starting in 1961 is 4/5000 thousand tonnes.65% goes to Cockenzie power station,20% for industrial and internal use,15% for homes.About 1800 people are employed. Fatal accidents-8.The miners recently returned after striking for 53 weeks. Penland industrial estate-modern day dev. with good access to nearby routes to all parts.Large factories are Glayva Scotch whisky liqueur,Globe-a soft drinks company.James Ross confections,making the Edinburgh
